img_above_text:
![Wukong LowerHollow 1.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/49/Wukong_LowerHollow_1.jpg)
Now that you've defeated Buddha's Right Hand and created a path with its corpse, the last section of the Webbed Hollow awaits you.
img_below_text:
Before you drop down the ledge after crossing the corpse of the boss, look for a little ledge leading left, leading to a small cliff area with a small golden pot that contains a **Celestial Taiyi Pill** , increasing your maximum mana.
The Webbed Hollow Taiyi Pill

content.text:

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong LowerHollow 1.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/49/Wukong_LowerHollow_1.jpg)

The Webbed Hollow Taiyi Pill"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.

img_summary: The image depicts a character standing in a dark, rocky area within the Webbed Hollow, with a small golden pot highlighted in the distance. This pot contains a Celestial Taiyi Pill, which increases the player's maximum mana. The image serves to guide players to this hidden item before they drop down a ledge after crossing the corpse of the boss, Buddha's Right Hand.
